# Interface EntityInterface

Interface for defining an entity for named entity recognition.

interface EntityInterface {  
name: string;  
rules?: [DictionaryRuleInterface](./primitives_ner_dictionary_rule.DictionaryRuleInterface)[];  
}

##### Index

### Properties

name rules?

## Properties

### name

name: string

Name/type of the entity

### `Optional`rules

rules?: [DictionaryRuleInterface](./primitives_ner_dictionary_rule.DictionaryRuleInterface)[]

Optional dictionary rules for entity matching
